title: Summary
content: Highly motivated and quick-learning junior college student with a strong passion for software development, particularly in the web development field with a focus on Angular. Possessing a diverse technical skillset encompassing C/C++, interpreter design (including experience building a tree-walker and currently developing a bytecode compiler), full-stack web development using React and Angular, and native iOS development with Swift, SwiftUI, and Xcode. Proven ability to design and implement full-stack web applications and native iOS apps. Eager to contribute to application development and explore opportunities to contribute to developer tools and programming language ecosystems.
